data.title: Importing and Exporting Web Parts
data.text:
Importing and Exporting Web Parts

Once you have configured ComponentOne Studio for SharePoint Web Parts, you can export them so they can be used on other SharePoint sites.

To export ComponentOne Web Parts

Open the SharePoint page containing the Web Part you would like to export.

In Edit mode, click the drop-down in the upper-right corner of the Web Part and choose Export from the menu.

Â

Click Save and save the .webpart file.

Â

To import ComponentOne Web Parts
